alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations; North Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 3:26PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Platte and east central Converse Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 325 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Douglas, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Douglas. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 124 and 141. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Converse County Lower Elevations; North Laramie Range
